description: Otto Lilienthal, also known as the "Glider King", appears in the first episode where he snatches Yomiko`s book while she is in the Library of Congress. The Library team chases him to New York City, where Yomiko builds a giant paper airplane to engage Lilienthal in aerial combat. Yomiko and Nancy defeat him by attaching a paper grappling hook to his glider, which then crashes into the Statue of Liberty.
name: Otto Lilienthal
